title: Design Thinking-Based Mathematics Creativity Development Course for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Core mathematical subject knowledge and grasp of fundamental instructional design principles
context.additional_context: Collaborative learning environment utilizing digital devices, with formative assessment-centered feedback system

learning_goals: Prospective teachers can implement creative problem-solving approaches when designing mathematics lessons by applying design thinking stages.
Learners can iteratively improve mathematics teaching plans by incorporating peer feedback in a PBL environment.
Participants can develop mathematics activity materials that meet creativity assessment rubric criteria (originality, flexibility, elaboration).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
